title: Technical Consultant in "A School in Agouti"
content:
**Sep 2019 - Jan 2020 ETH Zurich, Studio Boltshauser & Schlueter**

* Worked with an architect to design a ~1000 m^2 school in Agouti and accomplished 3 public presentations of 70+ audience 
* Performed passive energy estimation using Grasshopper Ladybug Honeybee, energy demand calculation, and detailed system design using EnergyPlus and LCA analysis throughout the design procedure

![](https://26808843.s21i.faiusr.com/4/ABUIABAEGAAg-KLQhgYoyPPqvQUwwQI45QE.png.webp)
